text: 10:23 1 Tesalonika 5:24; 2 Tesalonika 3:3; Hibru 4:14; 11:11E fo, bizir God ingarasa akam akɨriziba, a bar guizbangɨra dar ingaram. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e uan nɨghnɨzir gavgavibar gun mɨgɨa ghaze, bizir aghuir e fogha iniamiba bagha mɨzua iti. Egh e uan nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn suiragh bar gavgavigham.
